description: Malva`s Houndoom was the final Pokémon that Alain`s Charizard faced in his 10 straight Mega Pokémon battle. Malva`s Houndoom can mega evolve and Malva said that flames are a meal for it. Despite having a stamina advantage having been rested unlike Alain`s Charizard who was tired from the previous 9 battles, Houndoom ended up loosing the battle.
name: Hellgar (Pachira)
